typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		journey as (key as string, value as string)[],
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> JourneystructureTakeda
source(output(
		{_id} as string,
		cohort_id as string,
		completion_time as string,
		email as string,
		guid as string,
		journeys_id as string,
		journeys_name as string,
		status as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> BlobStorageTakeda
JourneystructureTakeda foldDown(unroll(journey),
	mapColumn(
		title,
		key = journey.key,
		value = journey.value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flatten1
flatten1 derive(custom = regexReplace(key, '[^0-9]','')) ~> derivedColumn1
select1 filter(custom != "") ~> TakedaJourneyStructure
BlobStorageTakeda, TakedaJourneyStructure join(guid == custom,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
join1 filter(value!="" && length(value) <50) ~> filter2
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		value,
		custom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
flatten2 unpivot(output(
		
	),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> unpivot1
filter2 foldDown(unroll(),
	mapColumn(
		{_id},
		cohort_id,
		completion_time,
		email,
		guid,
		journeys_id,
		journeys_name,
		status,
		type,
		value,
		custom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flatten2
unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
